name: Beef Stroganoff
description: A Russian dish made with sautéed beef and sour cream sauce.
recipe: Sauté beef and onion until browned. Add mushrooms and continue cooking. Stir in sour cream and let simmer. Serve hot with rice or noodles.

name: Pad Thai
description: A Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with shrimp, tofu, and vegetables.
recipe: Soak rice noodles in water. In a separate pan, stir-fry shrimp, tofu, and vegetables. Add soaked noodles to the pan and stir-fry until cooked. Serve hot with peanuts and lime wedges.

name: Pizza
description: A classic Italian dish made with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings.
recipe: Roll out pizza dough and spread tomato sauce on top. Add cheese and desired toppings. Bake in a preheated oven until crust is crispy and cheese is melted.

name: Taco
description: A Mexican dish consisting of a tortilla filled with meat, beans, and vegetables.
recipe: Cook ground beef and beans together. Warm tortilla in a separate pan. Add meat mixture and desired toppings to the tortilla. Serve hot.

name: Burger
description: Ground meat patty in a bun
recipe: Grill or pan-cook the ground beef patty. Place in a bun and top with cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles.

name: Cheesecake
description: Sweet dessert with a cream cheese topping
recipe: Make a graham cracker crust, then blend cream cheese, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Pour into crust and bake. Chill before serving.
